description: Active Duty is celebrating its 15th Anniversary! My god, can you believe it? I sure can't. Has it really been that many years since I launched this little site that turned into what you see today?Active Duty started in the Autumn of 1998 and truly, my life has never been the same since. I want to thank you -- our valued members and visitors -- who have been faithful through thick and thin. I'm sure some of you were around back then in 1998, when the site was as bare-bones as you could get, with animated gifs of dancing pink flamingos and atrocious green-and-yellow graphics. (Well, some things never change -- that pink flamingo is still on the site, loud and proud -- it's just taken on a different look over the years. lol.)To help celebrate our 15th Anniversary, we had Cole -- that's King Cole to many of you -- edit together a special retrospective video of some of our greatest moments on video. I had some serious flashbacks watching it, I tell you what. So many memories streamed through my mind as I watched it. And, I think a lot of you long-timers out there will really get a kick out of it.And, for you new visitors, it's just a sample of the more than 800 full-length videos that are streaming on demand (and available for DRM-free download) inside the members section of the site.In addition to the video montage, there is also a fun gallery featuring highlights from the last 15 years. Of course, the internet was a different beast then, and you'll probably find the oldest photos mighty tiny and grainy- but super hot nonetheless.
title: 15 Years Of Active Duty, Scene #01
